about_the_game:
Hey hey,

in this demo you will be able to test the first few chess puzzles and some skirmish matches.
You are limited in the world choice and can just play a limited number of puzzles until the demo ends.

Because this is one of the most often questions and I haven't found the time to make it more visible in game:
There is a question mark in the top left corner, so you can see which piece is which.

Have fun
KeyboardKrieger
detailed_description:
Hey hey,

in this demo you will be able to test the first few chess puzzles and some skirmish matches.
You are limited in the world choice and can just play a limited number of puzzles until the demo ends.

Because this is one of the most often questions and I haven't found the time to make it more visible in game:
There is a question mark in the top left corner, so you can see which piece is which.

Have fun
KeyboardKrieger
name: SchachKampf Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 340MHZ
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 152 MB available space

short_description: Fantasy chess puzzle demo for Schachkampf
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Polish
*languages with full audio support
